name: Plbid
tag_list: penny-auction, penny-auctions, uk-penny-auction, uk-penny-auctions, chepeast-penny-auction, best-penny-auctions
overview:
Plbid.co.uk offers gadgets at bargain prices. We offer latest, brand new iPods, iPhone, laptops, Computer, digital cameras, LCD HD TVs, Blue-ray Player, Car, Camera, Gifts, Jewellery, Men & Women Accessories, Money, electronic gadgets, the latest gaming consoles, luxury watches, designer goods and other fall under the auction hammer everyday and sell for prices that can only be described as totally bargains.

Plbid is a unique internet auction experience. They offer an online auction for consumers, based on the principles of an few-Style Auction â€“ it is the right type of competition for participants who want to auction attractive goods and services at best prices.

The Plbid Team

Plbid.co.uk is led by a group of professionals with long experience in IT, marketing, finance and entrepreneurship. The management team’s past work experience comes from Software Development.

What is Plbid?

Plbid is the real deal in online auctions, an exciting online auction â€“ fast and simple to create an account, easy to bid, Plbid offers brand new, high end, state of the art products, including iPods, iPhone, laptops, Computer, digital cameras, LCD HD TVs, Blue-ray Player, Car, Camera, Gifts, Jewellery, Men & Women Accessories, Money, electronic gadgets, the latest gaming consoles, luxury watches and designer goods at incredibly low prices in auctions that start at just 1p or any amount setup with no reserve. With each placed bid, the price of the auctioned item increases by auction type up to winner found depending on your choice and the auction item. When you bid, we reset the countdown back up to the maximum time. The countdown time may vary from just 10 seconds up to 15 minutes. If no-one else bids and the countdown reaches zero, you win the auction item at a bargain price!

plbid has number of auction types which are

a.) Beginner Auction b.) Fixed Price auction c.) Free Auction (100% off) d.) Blink Auction e.) 20 seconds Auction f.) 30 Seconds Auction g.) User penny Auction
